Package simplenlg.kb

Interface Summary
KBEntity KBEntity is an interface to a knowledge base entity (object, class, instance).
NLGKB NLGKB is an interface to an NLG knowledge base
 

Class Summary
JavaKB JavaKB implements a simpleNLG KB by using Java classes.
JavaKBClass JavaKBClass is a superclass for classes in a JavaKB
Lexicaliser Lexicaliser converts a KBEntity into a PhraseSpec
SimpleKB SimpleKB is a simple implementation of an NLGKB
SimpleKBClass SimpleKBClass represents a class in SimpleKB
